meanings.sent1: I will pretrain my dog before the competition.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pretrain for the marathon to improve her performance.
meanings.sent3: The chef pretrains the staff on the new menu items with fun quizzes.
meanings.sent4: He pretrains his mind with positive affirmations before facing challenges.
meanings.sent5: Pretraining your memory with mnemonic devices can help you remember better.

meanings.sent1: The coach will pretrain the team before the season starts.
meanings.sent2: It is important to pretrain employees before assigning them tasks.
meanings.sent3: The teacher pretrains the students on the basics of the subject to build a strong foundation.
meanings.sent4: She pretrains her voice with vocal exercises before singing in public.
meanings.sent5: Pretraining new recruits ensures they are ready for the job.

meanings.definition: Training that occurs before the main training.
meanings.sent1: The pretrain session helped the participants understand the main training better.
meanings.sent2: Attending the pretrain workshop is mandatory for all new employees.
meanings.sent3: The pretrain event turned out to be more fun than the main training.
meanings.sent4: The pretrain program acts as a foundation for the subsequent training.
meanings.sent5: Participants found the pretrain activities engaging and informative.
